title: 339 Broadway #210 - 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom Condo
posting_body: ['Beautifully remodeled 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath Hacienda Laguna condo with spacious\xa0wrapping balcony on the lagoon perfect for entertaining.', 'Location is everything!!', 'Perfect for hosting, and making memories with friends and family at the community pool.', 'Lounge chairs on the grounds, lots of greenery such as lawns, trees, and bushes are maintained by the association.', "When you're not entertaining at home, take a leisurely stroll to Shoreline Drive spotlighting an awesome two-lane bike lane, Alameda’s South Shore Beach, South Shore Center, great parks, playgrounds, and public transportation.", 'Minutes to Alameda’s historic theater, local eats, and lounges', 'This stunner Condo is a one-level upper unit accessible by stairs or an elevator.', 'Features an open floor living-dining-kitchen combo.', 'Enjoy cooking in the kitchen with stainless steel appliances with soft-close cabinets, and a kitchen island with stone countertops.', 'Carpeted flooring, gleaming tile (in the entryway, bathrooms, and kitchen), ceiling fans, sound-reducing double pane windows, sliding glass doors, and a decorative fireplace.', 'Full 2 baths one has shower-over-tub and another fully renovated master bathroom perfect for a relaxing bath.', 'Additional features include a washer and dryer inside the unit.', 'Free laundry on-site, storage closet, and additional storage\xa0cabinet\xa0by the designated covered carport.', 'One pet is limited to 35lbs per HOA rules and regulations.', 'This residence has designer touches and plenty of closet space throughout.', 'Your search is over!!!!', 'Property is professionally managed by CZRE', 'Lease terms: 1 year lease', 'Rent: $3800', 'Security Deposit: $4500', 'Rental fee: One time 30% rental fee paid by tenant', '$4.37/month for 12 months Rent Program Fee\xa0 (Tenant Responsibility)', 'Pets friendly', 'Tenant pay electric only', '1 carport parking space - #43', 'Washer/Dryer in unit / Coin laundry on-site', 'Contact the CZRE leasing team to schedule a viewing.', 'show contact info', 'Due to the current COVID-19 restrictions and high volume of inquiries, please be patient with us.', 'Please note that our showing schedule is typically Monday-Friday 9am-4pm and weekends by appointment only.', 'To expedite your request, include property address in the subject line with a few dates and times that you are available to preview.', 'We look forward to getting you into this great community.', 'Do not disturb residents.', 'Cerda-Zein Real Estate, Inc is an equal housing opportunity company.', 'Listed by Cerda-Zein Real Estate, Lic #01878914', 'See more rentals at <URL>', 'All information deemed reliable but has not been verified or guaranteed.']
